page.title: 05THE PLAYGROUP, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: In Westwoodside on Nethergate there is the Village Hall. Five days a week the{playgroup}meet there. The children who go are two to four years old. They meet from 9:15a.m. to ll:30 a.m.. There are several helpers and the children have many things to play on and in. For example table toys like drawing and jig-saws, painting and gluing pictures on pieces of paper. There is a book corner and also a wendy house and sand and water to play in. Half way through the session they all have a drink of orange and a biscuit, and there is sometimes a meeting to see the parents. The helpers like to meet new children who come to{playgroup.
